refnamediv.refpurpose: Reads from a location in za space at a-rate, adds some gain.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Reads from a location in za space at a-rate, adds some gain.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: kndx -- points to the za location to be read.
kgain -- multiplier for the a-rate signal.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: zarg reads the array of floats at kndx in za space, which are ksmps number of a-rate floats to be processed in a k cycle. zarg also multiplies the a-rate signal by a k-rate value kgain.
